title.emphasis: Figure 4: C. elegans transcription factor genes with clear orthologs in the human genome.

formalpara.para: The percentage of C. elegans genes from each DNA-binding domain family with clear orthologs in the human genome (Reece-Hoyes et al., 2005; Shaye and Greenwald, 2011). Only DNA-binding domain families with 3 or more C. elegans members are included.
